message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $10,000. It's worth every penny! I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer, but I can't go that low.  How about $9,000?  That gives us both a good deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm afraid I still need to stick to my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $7,500. That's the highest I can go.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to come down to $8,500.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I think it's worth it for the value of the product. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $8,000. That's the most I can afford.
